properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 5 at 9:19AM EST until February 7 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 7 to 10 ft possible.

* WHERE...South Santee River to Edisto Beach out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Friday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING
